Manage and Develop the Sable Storage team inside Fast Data Technologies. We manage one of the higher throughput NoSQL databases in the world, serving trillions of requests daily on PB+ sized data-sets. We are an accelerator and enabler for Amazon’s internal businesses, making them more effective at managing, optimizing and acting on the huge volumes of data at their disposal.Interested in exciting work at nearly unparalleled scale? I am hiring for Experienced, Senior and Principal engineers. Let's connect and have a discussion!

Oversee the development, deployment and operation of enterprise SaaS products implemented by numerous Fortune 500 clients.Serve as an informatics thought leader and conduit between medical, business, creative and technology professionals. Primary architect for a SaaS based clinical and financial analytics platform. Orchestrate all software development efforts, asset allocation, and budgeting, including company vision, long-range strategic planning, security, and compliance to SOCI, SOCII and HIPAA/HITECH. Highly skilled in solutions architecture, project management, systems design, implementation, and transition to post-production support. Lead a cross-functional team of 25-50 members supporting SaaS based applications and successfully collaborated with several business groups.Selected Contributions:♦ Provided critical service to customers through the SaaS platform that utilizes medical/pharmacy claims, electronic health records and biometric data-points towards improving member health, ensuring equitable compensation and eliminating adjudication errors♦ Successfully developed and managed the divisional budget of and achieved budgetary performance objectives in each of the last 6 fiscal years.♦ Serve as the primary architect for a SaaS based population health management system, currently serving over 150,000 active members and generating significant yearly revenues.♦ Built the I.T. department from the ground up including Development, Operations, Analytics and Security Teams, entirely managed through an Agile (SCRUM) framework.♦ Developed a Medical Data Analytics Platform that has analyzed billions of medical and pharmacy claims, providing actionable intelligence to clients valued at over $600m.

As one of the founding members of the company, served as the voice of the customer and product owner for over 100 different small and mid-sized Retail and Healthcare clients across the US, architecting customized solutions and e-commerce platforms for them.Led customer projects ranging from email marketing to large scale e-commerce platforms from initiation to launch, overseeing development, deployment and execution of web strategies, sites and applications. Collaborated between internal, near-shore and off-shore development teams to ensure smooth delivery of projects within stipulated time lines and budgets.Selected Contributions:◆ Created a revenue stream from zero to $25k/month in the software and web application development lines of business.◆ Played an integral role in enabling clients establish their products and vision in the market.

As the first IT employee of the startup, built the IT department from scratch, laying the foundation of a strong IT infrastructure for the company and helping it grow from inception to 30+ employees.Oversaw the development of a national publication management system and the successful implementation of the corporate network. Developed the corporate network infrastructure including Data and Voice connectivity for the corporate office, corporate data center and over 30 mobile employees.Selected Contributions:◆ Played a key role in facilitating a sale of the company to XO Group (NYSE : XOXO)◆ Developed an online publication and advertising platform that successfully managed 12 different market specific publications with minimal production staff, saving the company in excess of $500k / year in labor costs.

It was my pleasure to work for Michael. Michael is one of those rare people who understand a vast amount of technology as well as knows how to manage a team. He is passionate about the well being of his team and the quality of their work. He is a true leader, creating long lasting professional relationships to create a comfortable working environment. He creates a mutual respect with his team members and that creates a trusting bond. Michael has a vast amount of knowledge and experience in all aspects of technology. He can quickly understand large environments and projects. Michael can talk to both technical and non-technical people in language that both can understand, thus bridging the gap between technology teams and leadership. I highly recommend Michael.

I have worked with more than one hundred IT professionals over the past 30 years and with Michael Decker since I hired him 7 years ago. Michael hands down is the most outstanding performer I have worked with. As CEO and COO, I worked closely with Michael, in his role as CTO. He is exceptional in his work ethic and leadership skills, the breadth and depth of knowledge base, Michael operates as an "owner" in all endeavors and understands most elements of business better than most c-suites. Perhaps most importantly, he is honest, forthright and a joy to work with if you share a similar commitment to honesty, integrity and continuous improvement. In our time together Michael led the development of a remarkable enterprise level SaaS system in ultra lean fashion. January 19, 2017, Jeremiah reported directly to Michael

Michael is a #WinWinWin!A Win - for your Business Leadership.  Michael has an uncanny ability to understand the business needs and desires of an organization and translate those into technology solutions.  He speaks the language of business to business minded people.  He’s a great asset for senior leadership teams.A Win - for your Information Technology teams.  Michael speaks IT as well as anyone.  He understands all layers of technology - complex infrastructures and terminology, budgets and timelines, roadmaps, methodologies, frameworks and best practices.  He understands issues of security, compliance and certifications.  He leads well, motivating others to take ownership of responsibilities and to deliver on deadlines.  He stands as a safeguard, buffering communication between organizational units maintaining sufficient separation of concerns, allowing teams to work efficiently, focused on highest priorities. A Win - for individual team members.  This is where Michael shines.  Michael is able to cast a vision and instill that vision onto other people, giving them the reigns to research, develop and implement solutions.  He trusts in people’s abilities to deliver products while gently leading, guiding, and directing them.  He humbly accepts when team members challenge his own knowledge and assumptions and gracefully surrenders to others when appropriate, or redirects to more appropriate solutions. He encourages people to grow their knowledge base and skillsets and tries to provide opportunities for this growth, and he is generous in rewarding team members for their contributions.As a Team Leader or Chief of Technology, I extend my highest recommendation for Michael Decker.

Fred Yu
Director of Application Development at TrendShift
December 8, 2016, Fred reported directly to Michael

What Michael means to me:I have enjoyed the pleasure of Michael's company and allowed the wealth of his knowledge, insights, and expertise to effortlessly flow towards myself and members of our team. He is personally productive and accountable to himself, team, and members of senior leadership. There isn't much that happens without him.Michael is the personification of our culture and makes me and others want to perform at our personal best each and every day. We do this because he helps us to see a common vision - to be a part of something bigger than ourselves. His energy and enthusiasm energize us all. Beyond all of his knowledge and expertise, he possesses an array of soft skills that naturally engage at just the right moment. He can challenge, build up, mentor and coach as necessary as though it's second nature.Last but not least - Michael has modeled personal integrity as only one other person in my life has. He does so on a daily basis. I can't emphasize how rare that is. I trust him absolutely - his expertise, his judgement, and his motives.What Michael means to the company:Michael is our Chief Technology Officer (CTO) and is responsible for the management of TrendShift's research and development (R&D). He is the author of our product and technology roadmaps that capture the short- and long-term needs of the company, and utilizes capital to make investments designed to help us reach our objectives. He is passionate about system building and systems thinking, and creating solutions to problems or developing new opportunities.Because we are a small company, he also performs the role of CIO and CISO. In those roles, he has helped to navigate the regulatory obstacles to secure our applications, intellectual property, and our client's data. He was responsible for implementing the critical security controls for SANS20 as well as controls for Service Organization (SOC2) relevant to security, availability, processing integrity,  and confidentiality.

Fred is one of the most dedicated, agile and hard working technology executives that I have ever met. I feel truly privileged to have had the opportunity to have him on my team and can only hope we have the opportunity to work together again some day.He demonstrates, on a daily basis, his ability to grasp complex ideas and market opportunities and translate them into functional software products. His grasp and understanding of the SDLC is second-to-none and his ability to manage that life cycle with often demanding time and resource constraints is remarkable. He proved to be a wealth of knowledge regarding a wide array of technology products, languages and patterns. Beyond his hard technology skills, Fred has exceptional soft-skills when it comes to managing developers and customers, both internal and external. His EQ is top notch and I could always count on him to show up in a positive, productive and appropriate manner, regardless the circumstances. Finally, Fred is an outstanding person. As a man of integrity, he does what he says he will do and so much more.
